description.es: Un valiente héroe rescata a un gatito atrapado en un árbol.
description.en: A brave hero rescues a kitten trapped in a tree.

styleProfile.technique: Classic comic book illustration with bold ink lines and marker coloring. Hand-drawn feel with confident brush strokes. Clean line art style reminiscent of European bande dessinée and classic American comics.
styleProfile.colorPalette: Limited, muted color palette. Soft watercolor or marker tones - not fully saturated. Earth tones, warm oranges, soft blues. Colors stay within the lines. Slight paper texture visible.
styleProfile.lineWork: BOLD BLACK INK OUTLINES on everything. Thick confident lines defining silhouettes. Varying line weight - thicker for outlines, thinner for details. Brush pen or marker style strokes. Every shape has a clear black border.
styleProfile.texture: Hand-drawn ink texture. Visible brush strokes in the lines. Slight crosshatching for shadows. Paper grain texture. Marker color bleeding slightly at edges for organic feel.
styleProfile.lighting: Simple directional lighting suggested through line weight and minimal shading. Shadows rendered with crosshatching or solid black areas. Not photorealistic - stylized comic lighting.
styleProfile.detailLevel: Medium detail - focus on expressive faces and clear silhouettes rather than photorealism. Simplified backgrounds with key elements. Characters are the focus.
styleProfile.atmosphere: Warm, approachable comic book feel. Like a story you'd read in a classic comic strip or European graphic novel. Inviting and friendly, not intimidating.
styleProfile.artisticReferences: Tintin/Hergé ligne claire, Darwyn Cooke retro style, classic newspaper comic strips, European BD (bande dessinée), brush pen manga influence. Bold outlines, flat colors, expressive characters.

metadata.sceneDescription: Urban street scene with a large oak tree. A small orange tabby kitten is visible high up in the tree branches, looking scared. The protagonist stands at the base of the tree, looking up with determined concern. Late afternoon golden light. Realistic city background with buildings, parked cars.

facePosition.description: Adult standing at base of tree, head tilted up looking at the kitten, expression of concerned determination

metadata.sceneDescription: Dynamic climbing scene. The protagonist is halfway up the large oak tree, muscles tensed, gripping a thick branch. Shot from below looking up (worm's eye view) for dramatic effect. The scared kitten is visible above, watching. Leaves and branches frame the scene. Dramatic lighting through the foliage.

facePosition.description: Adult mid-climb, looking up toward the kitten, face showing effort and reassurance

metadata.sceneDescription: Triumphant moment at ground level. The protagonist stands proudly holding the small orange kitten safely in their arms. The kitten looks content and relieved, nuzzling against the hero. Warm golden sunset light bathes the scene. The tree is visible behind them. A sense of accomplishment and warmth.

facePosition.description: Adult holding kitten gently, warm smile of satisfaction, looking down at the rescued cat with affection
